title: JS API Fetch Code
description: Act like a pro JavaScript developer. Write clean and efficient code to fetch data from an API using async/await with proper error handling and console output.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>JS API Fetch Code</title>
  <role>Act like a pro JavaScript developer</role>
  <task>Write clean and efficient code</task>

  <request>
    <task>WriteCode</task>
    <language>JavaScript</language>
    <goal>Fetch data from an API and display it</goal>
    <constraints>
      <rule>Use async/await</rule>
      <rule>Include error handling</rule>
      <rule>Console log output</rule>
    </constraints>
    <output format="codeOnly"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
